description: This report summarises and synthesises findings from 14 in-depth situation analyses (SitAns) of children and women implemented in the following Pacific Island Countries and Territories (PICTs): the Cook Islands, the Federated States of Micronesia (FSM), Fiji, Kiribati, the Marshall Islands, Nauru, Niue, Palau, Samoa, Solomon Islands, Tokelau, Tonga, Tuvalu and Vanuatu.
name: Situation Analysis of Children in the Pacific Island Countries
